results.name: Number of set-systems covering n vertices with no singletons.
formula: Inverse binomial transform of A016031 shifted once to the left.
xref: Cf. A000295, A000371, A000612, A003465 (with singletons), A006129 (covers by pairs), A016031, A055154, A055621, A305001, A317795 (unlabeled case), A323817 (connected case).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 30 2019
